definition: warm/lukewarm/temperature/to warm up/mild/soft/tender/to review (a lesson etc)/fever (TCM)/old variant of 瘟[wen1]

sentences.english: But through her cheek is warm tears.
sentences.chinese: 但是流过她脸颊的泪却是温馨的。

sentences.english: I was too tired to be active. And it did comfort me greatly seeing Zhihui there .
sentences.chinese: 结果是我精神不振，但看到志慧时的确觉得很温馨。

sentences.english: Who is using the hard-working hands, as we have built a happy home?
sentences.chinese: 是谁用勤劳的双手，为我们营造一个温馨的家园？

sentences.english: The students can't keep the boy quiet.
sentences.chinese: 那位教死没有能让小孩温馨下去。

sentences.english: A bit long perhaps but otherwise nonoffensive and kind of sweet.
sentences.chinese: 虽然可能有点长，但却毫无恶意，反而有种温馨感。

sentences.english: Warm and cosy private dining rooms are available - book early to avoid disappointment.
sentences.chinese: 舒适温馨的单间接受预定服务，请提前致电。

sentences.english: I am 42 years old this year, and graduated from middle school.
sentences.chinese: 今年42岁，初中文化，有个温馨的四口之家。

sentences.english: The whole design is like a crook-shaped arm of the mother, cozy and comfortable.
sentences.chinese: 整体设计犹如母亲的臂弯，温馨，舒适。

sentences.english: The past country estate is yet their warm homestead today.
sentences.chinese: 往日的田园依旧是今日温馨家园。

sentences.english: Yuehua is a Chinese national brand that is famous for its "warmth".
sentences.chinese: 以“温馨”著称的服务品质形成中国人的民族品牌。

sentences.english: You may want to have the place arranged so that it is soothing to your senses.
sentences.chinese: 你也肯能会想有一个安排好的使你有温馨感受的地方。

sentences.english: With green environmental protection decorates material, give you a healthy sweet home.
sentences.chinese: 以绿色环保型家饰质料，给你一个康健温馨的故里。

sentences.english: But I want to say that some trouble are sweet.
sentences.chinese: 但我想说的是，有些“经”念起来也挺温馨的。

sentences.english: Look at your warm message, thinking of you too.
sentences.chinese: 看着你温馨的短信，想着贪睡的你。

sentences.english: The air burbled with hellos and choir members warming up.
sentences.chinese: 空气中弥漫着唱诗班成员温馨的祝福。

sentences.english: Shines with a feel-good, spare text that goes right to the heart of childhood emotions.
sentences.chinese: 用温馨的只字片语触及你内心真实的童年情感。

definition: qualities that delight children (e.g. bold colors in a picture, anthropomorphized characters in a TV show, the physical challenge of playground equipment)
